title: Medieval Sounds - Sound Effects
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


In this pack I created some sound effects that I believe are useful in medieval style games, you will find sounds of medieval weapons, metal banging, scraping, whooshs, Coins, among many others.


It's important to remember that I used the 'medieval' theme but if your game is from any other theme that the sound effect works with, you can use it without any problems! Whooshs for example can be used in different situations and scenarios.


You'll also get the background music for free, as a gift to you! By investing in this package you take all that and it still encourages me to make more sound effects at a nice price for the game development community! :D


Check the preview

Check the first update

Check the documentation


This are the folders, every folder contains more than one file, 125 sound effects files in total :)

technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 220

Number of Audio Cues: 220

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) The loop sounds contains "loop" in the name

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the image is distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay.
